title: Package development workflow
text: run package unit tests, run following code: robust way continuously running unit tests use terminal watchexec. First download watchexec: run watch command re-run unit tests R file updated:
code: testthat::auto_test_package() brew install watchexec watchexec -e R 'Rscript -e "devtools::test()"'

title: Package development workflow
text: docker-based approach created test package installation. create testing docker image run following: start container test whether package ’s dependencies successfully installed, run: Github action using system added repository set run changes made main branch.
code: docker build -t tbmstr:dev -f docker/Dockerfile . docker run -it --rm tbmstr::dev

title: Package development workflow
text: Vignettes long-form articles support users full workflow rather providing detailed documentation individual package function. Vignettes created Rmd files saved ./vignettes directory. need manually rendered ensure --date. automatically included devtools::check() function call default arguments used. development, convenient review changes vignette rendered HTML. can set watchexec using command :

title: Package development workflow
text: package includes learnr interactive tutorials users follow. seperate article included documentation show users access tutorials. run tutorials developent, run following R command:

title: Package development workflow
code: watchexec -e Rmd "Rscript -e 'devtools::load_all(); tbmstr::run_quality_check(     data_path = \"data/test-data/epiinfo/\",     output_file = file.path(          system.file(package = \"tbmstr\"),                                 \"dev\", \"quality.html\" ))'"
